Recap: Ian discovers that making love with Lucy alleviates his vampire symptoms every time. Kevin lurks outside the cabin and abducts his wife when Ian is out of the room. After some romantic time alone, Rafe and Alison strategize about how to do battle with Caleb. Jamal is puzzled by the behavior of the woman he assumes is his girlfriend. He has no idea that Marissa has left town with no memory of ever being there, and that Casey, her dead identical twin/guardian angel, is taking her place. Caleb is frustrated by his inability to stop thinking about Tess and start concentrating on his music. Casey is happy to be reunited with Ricky, even though he believes she's Marissa. A catfight breaks out when Reese sees the way Casey looks at her little drummer boy. Although Ricky and Jamal pull the women apart, it's a furious Caleb who actually breaks up the fight. Jamal argues with "Marissa" about her continued association with the band. Caleb learns that Joshua hasn't checked in with the band since the first day of his trip to Capri. After making a few phone calls, he announces that the manager has disappeared. Being nothing like her sister in abilities or personality, Casey worries about pulling this off. Caleb realizes that Rafe had something to do with Joshua's disappearance.
Transcript: Alison: You know, all of those weeks that -- that I didn't know if we were ever going to be able to be together, I -- I forgot how much fun it was to --
Rafe: To do what we just did?
Alison: Well, yeah. Yeah. But, more so, to be able to spend time like this.
Rafe: Like what?
Alison: I don't know, just -- just holding each other and being able to touch you and tickle you.
Rafe: I forgot to tell you I'm not -- I'm not really ticklish anymore.
Alison: Oh, you're not?
Rafe: No. It's like a -- you know, an ancient slayer mind trick. It's not going to work, ok?
Alison: Oh, I see. You're all of a sudden speaking you're not very ticklish?
Rafe: Uh-huh.
Alison: Maybe not even right in through here?
Rafe: Ok.
Alison: Or here?
Rafe: Ok --
Alison: Because I know you're ticklish here. Say it. Say "uncle" or I won't stop. I swear it. I swear. I swear.
Rafe: I don't want you to stop.
Alison: Say it. Say it.
Rafe: Uncle.
Alison: "Uncle" -- say it again.
Rafe: Uncle.
Alison: I didn't know. For -- for so long I didn't know if we were going to be able to hold each other like this and touch each other.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Jamal: Did you just call me "dude"?
Casey: Did I say that?
Jamal: Yeah. Yeah, you did, and you look --
Casey: Oh -- well, what's wrong with the way I look?
Jamal: Well, nothing's wrong with the way you look. It's just not you.
Casey: Look, Jamal, I -- I know we've been kind of tight for a while --
Jamal: "Kind of tight"?
Casey: But those boring rags that you like on me have been getting in the way of my creative flow, ok? And if I'm going to start working with a rock star, I got to start looking like one.

Jamal: Yeah, but you're not. I thought we decided you weren't going to do the band thing. Not with Stephen, not with the vampire. Or did you forget the whole bloodsucking -- all that stuff that comes --
Casey: No, no. No, I did not forget. I just decided not to listen.
Jamal: What?
Casey: Look, oh. I got to go my own way, all right? That's what artists do, ok? Catch you later, bro.
Jamal: "Bro"?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Reese: Cool it, Ricky! Cool it! Chill! We all know this band's not going anywhere, all right? Just cool it.
Caz: Stephen always comes through, man. You just got to kick back and trust him. He's got a lot going on.
Caleb: What is the matter with me? The words, the music, just aren't coming. Why can't I concentrate?
Tess' voice: You still want Olivia. You still think you can draw her out from inside me. You said no more tricks, and you lied. You're trying to trick me now. Shame on you, Stephen.
Caleb: Tess.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ian: Are you all right?
Lucy: I think I will be.
Ian: I understand, you know, saying good-bye to Kevin and staying here with me is --
Lucy: I can't tell you that doesn't hurt because it hurts a lot.
Ian: I'm sorry.

Lucy: No. I -- I don't -- I don't want you to be sorry. Because the good part of this whole thing is being with you. I just think letting go -- it's just never easy, huh? What about you? How are you feeling?
Ian: Oh, I'm all right. I'm fine. I'm -- it's going to be good. Everything's going to be just fine.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Kevin: Oh, Lucy. Lucy, Lucy, Lucy.

Kevin: Well, you don't get rid of me, Lucy. I get rid of you. I get rid of you and your crystals and your tarots and your dumb crystal balls and everything else that you love! All of this goes out, Lucy! None of this stays! You think you can do this to me? Well, you're wrong.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ian: After everything that happened with you and Kevin, you did the right thing. You do trust your heart, don't you?
Lucy: I always trust my heart. And I made my choice, and I picked you. Hey. You feel warm.
Ian: Oh, I'm fine.
Lucy: No. No, no, no. Wait.
Lucy: Here.
Ian: Hmm -- that feels good.
Lucy: A little better?
Ian: Mm-hmm.
Lucy: Here. Here.
Ian: What would I do without you?
[SCENE_BREAK]
(watching a video)
Rev. Giovanni: Do you, Kevin Collins, take this woman to be your lawfully wedded wife, to have and to hold from this day forward --
Kevin: The day we got married, Lucy, was perfect.
Rev. Giovanni: For richer or poorer --
Kevin: The most beautiful day of our lives.
Rev. Giovanni: And in health, to honor and cherish --
Kevin: I loved you.
Rev. Giovanni: Until death do you part?
Kevin: I do.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ricky: Marissa, where have you been?
Casey: What's up, hot stuff?
Ricky: Your clothes -- they're -- they're different. You -- you look --
Casey: Bomb? Yeah, I know. Feel good, too. Not as good as you do, though, huh, as always?
Reese: Well, well, well. If it isn't little miss wannabe. Hands off, honey.
Casey: I'll be right back, slick.
Ricky: Wait -- hold on a minute.
Casey: You talking to me, you little skank?
Reese: What did you just call me?
Casey: Because if we're talking wannabe, then you want to be checking those roots, girl.
Reese: Oh, yeah?
Casey: Yeah.
Ricky: Hey, hey, hey! Whoa, whoa! Come on!
Jamal: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Calm down.
Ricky: Wait -- no, dude --
Casey: You know what? Ha!
Ricky: Come on!
Caz: Let them fight, man!
Casey: You're going down, girl! Yeah!
Ricky: Reese, calm down! Stop it! Stop! Just stop it! Get back!
Caleb: Hey! Hey! What the hell's going on here?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Alison: Don't you wish we could stay like this forever?
Rafe: Yeah, but we can't.
Alison: I know. But I want to. I don't want to go back to Port Charles. I don't want to go back and see what's facing us and waiting for us there.
Rafe: You mean Caleb?
Alison: Yeah. I just -- I want to just -- I want sleep and -- sleep in your arms and rest there and just feel peaceful and --
Rafe: I know, I know, I know.
Alison: And loved.
Rafe: I know. I want that, too. But we can't run away from our friends and family and everything they're going through.
Alison: I know.
Rafe: Ok? We got to go back, but that doesn't mean that we can't dream about, you know, what's on the other side.
Alison: You mean, like, us?
Rafe: Yes, us -- alone together at last, but -- but not yet.
Alison: Right. I, Alison Barrington, take you, Rafe Kovich, to be my husband.
Rafe: And I, Rafe Kovich, take you, Alison Barrington, to be my wife. Someday we'll have that wedding we always dreamed about.
Alison: Right. Someday --
Rafe: Yeah.
Alison: Soon, but now is -- it's not the right time, not the perfect time.
Rafe: But you know what? We will. We'll have our time. Right now's the time that I got to start doing what I trained to do my whole life.
Alison: You need to fight?
Rafe: With everything I got.
Alison: That's fine. But I had thought about it because I knew you were going to say that. And you're not going to do this alone.
Rafe: You -- you don't know what you're saying.
Alison: You and I were so good as a team. And this time is no different at all.
Rafe: I'm not --
Alison: It's no different.
Rafe: I don't suppose it would help if I locked you up someplace?
Alison: I would just scream really loud.
[Alison laughs]
Alison: You're stuck with me --
Rafe: Oh.
Alison: For life.
Rafe: Well, that's a good thing.
Alison: Yeah.

Rafe: Ok. So, listen, we don't have much time. Now, I don't know if Caleb has noticed that Joshua's missing yet, but as soon as he does and as soon as he figures out that we had something to do with it, that's when the battle really starts.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Casey: Maybe you don't "wannabe" messing with m anymore, huh, Reese?
Caleb: Marissa, stop it right now!
Casey: Oh, come on, Stephen! She started it, man!
Caleb: I don't care who started it! I don't care what it's about! You know what I care about I care about these lyrics, and I want your pass on them right now.
Casey: You got it, boss.
Jamal: She's not doing it. No way.
Casey: Jamal -- Jamal --
Jamal: Nope. Come here. Let me talk to you.
Casey: Jamal --
Jamal: What are you doing?
Casey: What are you doing?
Jamal: You had your fun now? Are you done? Are you finished?
Casey: What are you talking about?
Jamal: I'm talking about you. Look at you. You're dressing up like some girl I don't know. You come back to this band like it's cool and everything, like we even talked about this.
Casey: Jamal, not in front of the band, all right?
Jamal: Look, Marissa, I care about you, ok? I care about us. I don't get what you're doing.
Casey: You -- you just got to -- you got to let it go.
Jamal: Hold it. Stop, stop. Are you -- are you breaking up with me? Hmm?
Casey: We want different things is all.
Jamal: No, no. I want you, and you want to commit suicide, ok?
Casey: No, no, I know what I'm doing, I do.
Jamal: No, no, no -- no, no, no, you want to play music with a bunch of vampires. That's what you want to do, ok? You don't know what you're doing.
Caleb: I'm waiting, Marissa.
Casey: In a minute, ok, Stephen? Just -- Jamal, look, I'm sorry. I --
Jamal: It ain't over.

Ricky: You know what, Stephen? This whole time we're spending in the studio -- it's cool and everything, but aren't we supposed to be making the fans happy here? You know, when are we going to play a concert again?
Caleb: Get to work, Garza. You want to talk scheduling, talk to Joshua.
Ricky: Yeah, well, I would talk to Joshua if I knew where he was.
Caleb: What's that supposed to mean?
Ricky: It means that between your disappearing acts and his, you want to know something? This band is running on empty.
Caleb: Joshua's been on business. He's he not been phoning in?
Reese: Well, not since the first day. I thought you already knew about that.
Caleb: No. No, I didn't know. Buongiorno, Bruno. Hai visto Joshua? Sei sicuro? No. No, grazie.
Ricky: So what happened? Have they seen him? Have they talked to him?
Caleb: No. They haven't. Seems our friend Joshua has disappeared.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Lucy: I like your skin. You have nice skin. You know what? I thought you were really getting warm, you know, before we --
Ian: Well, we heated things up pretty well.
Lucy: Yeah. That's not what I'm talking about. What I'm talking about is I -- I don't know, I was kind of worried. I thought maybe your vampire symptoms are coming back, but looks like I was wrong.
Ian: No, you weren't.
Lucy: They really were? They were coming back?
Ian: Yeah -- hunger and the sweats -- but I'm fine now.
Lucy: Well, good, because I -- I feel a lot better, too.
Ian: No -- no. I mean, I'm fine now. I feel -- I feel good. I'm --
Lucy: You feel good? What do you mean, "good"? Do you mean a pre-vampire-bite kind of good?
Ian: Yeah. Because even when I drink Caleb's water, I -- I still have the symptoms, but I can fight them.
Lucy: Right, and now?
Ian: And now I'm -- I'm -- I'm normal, I'm myself. I feel like myself.
Lucy: Completely?
Ian: Yeah. And come to think of it, I was feeling the same way the last time we were, you know --
Lucy: Was that --
Ian: Yeah.
Lucy: Really? Oh, I know what you're trying to do. You're just trying to make me feel better, because even I don't believe that having sex with me is some sort of miracle cure for --
Ian: What if it is?
Lucy: What if it is? I mean, what if making love to me keeps you from becoming a vampire?
Ian: You thinking what I'm thinking?
Lucy: I think I'm thinking what you're thinking.
Ian: All right. I'm ready. Lucy, where'd you go? I thought we're going for a walk. Lucy?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Lucy: Oh!
Kevin: Shut up and get in the car!
Lucy: What are you going to prove, exactly, by kidnapping me like this? Ian!
Kevin: I don't know, maybe something to myself.
Lucy: Ow! Doc, please, let me -- ow, you're hurting me!
Kevin: Lucy, you belong to me and I belong to you, and nothing and no one is going to get in the way of that. Drive.
[Car starts]
[SCENE_BREAK]

Alison: Ok, so -- so let's think about this. Out of all of the millions of people out there who think that they know and love this Stephen Clay, there's really only a handful of people who know exactly who he is. There's Jack and Tess, right?
Rafe: Yeah. Ian and Lucy.
Alison: Uh-huh. Ian and Lucy. Jamal.
Rafe: And we can't forget about your mother.
Alison: No.
Rafe: It's going to take all of us to bring Caleb down.
Alison: I know.
Rafe: You understand we're going to have to lie to everybody on that list, all right, all our friends?
Alison: Yeah, yeah. We're just going to have to keep our relationship a secret, then.
Rafe: Yeah. It's too dangerous if Caleb finds out the truth.
Alison: Yeah. Well, we'll just keep it undercover. But, I mean, any way that you look at it, we really do have one hell of a team.
Rafe: Yeah. It's true. We got a team. God help us, we got a team.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Caleb: I don't care what it costs. You hire whoever or whatever you need. You find Joshua. Do you understand me?
Casey: Hey, Stephen?
Caleb: Not now, Marissa.
Casey: I -- I got those lyrics if you wanted to look at them. I'm done.
Caleb: Hold on a second.
Casey: I -- I didn't really do much because the song you wrote -- it was already good.
Caleb: What is this?
Casey: Huh?
Caleb: You made them worse. I didn't think it was possible -- they're worse. Try it again. Sorry, Jimmy.
Casey: I -- I didn't think they were that bad.
Reese: Tsk, tsk, tsk. Looks like the little birdie lost her gift.
Casey: Drop dead, sucker.

Casey: Sorry. It slipped, ok? But whoever said this was a good plan got it all wrong. Marissa's the one with the skills. I got the personality. Come on, man. Is there any way we can mix the two up a little? Something?

Caleb: Listen up, all of you. Joshua's missing, and no one we know has seen him. But you do not lose focus. It's back to work 24/7, as if your jobs depended on it. Do you understand me? Do you understand me?
Caz: Sure thing, Stephen.
Reese: Yeah, we're not going anywhere, boss.
Caleb: I should have known something was wrong. I should have felt it!
Caleb: This is you, isn't it, slayer? You know what happened to Joshua. So what's next, Rafe? Are you coming for me?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Rafe: Caleb. That's you, isn't it, vampire,... that's right. I'm coming after you. I am always coming after you.
[NEXT_ON]
Lucy: You can't just keep me a prisoner like this!
Kevin: You're not my prisoner, you're my wife.
Elizabeth: When I was sinking my fangs into that neck, I was loving every minute of it.
Caleb: You killed Joshua, and you have no idea what a tactical error that was.
